projects.title: Todo App

projects.description: Introducing our TypeScript chatbot: a sleek, intuitive assistant for quick and meaningful interactions. Built with TypeScript for reliability, it handles conversational tasks effortlessly, making it ideal for both personal and professional use.

projects.description: Our TypeScript Countdown Timer project: a simple and reliable tool for tracking time. Built with TypeScript, it makes time management easy. Perfect for students and professionals, our Countdown Timer features a user-friendly design for effortless countdowns.

projects.title: Editable Resume Builder
projects.description: Welcome to my Editable Resume Builder powered by HTML, CSS, and TypeScript: Create and customize your resume effortlessly through a dynamic and responsive interface. Enjoy fast performance and seamless navigation as you design your professional profile.

projects.title: Snake Game App

projects.description: Welcome to the Movie Searcher App: Quickly find and explore movies with an easy-to-use interface. Enjoy fast performance and smooth navigation as you browse details, ratings, and reviews for your favorite films.
